mapper.select: SELECT 'PSIX0' as data_type , 'A4600001' as base_code , tot.matnr , 'DUMMY' as inven_status , 'DUMMY' as lot , ISNULL(tot.supply_div,0) as supply_div , SUM(tot.inven_qty) as inven_qty , tot.meins , CONVERT(CHAR(10), getdate(), 112) as data_dt , '' as reserve1 , '' as reserve2 , '' as reserve3 , '' as reserve4 , '' as reserve5 FROM( SELECT mara.[MATNR] matnr , supply_div , inven_qty , case when mara.MEINS = 'EA' then 'PC' else mara.MEINS end meins FROM [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[MARA] mara inner join (SELECT [MATNR] ,SUM([LABST] + [UMLME] + [INSME]) inven_qty FROM [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[MARD] sub where concat([LFGJA],[LFMON]) = (SELECT MAX(concat([LFGJA],[LFMON])) FROM [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[MARD] where MATNR = sub.MATNR and LGORT = sub.LGORT) and [LABST] + [UMLME] + [INSME] > 0 group by [MATNR]) mard on mara.MATNR = mard.MATNR left outer join (SELECT distinct MATNR,case when LIFNR = 'A1000A01' then 1 else 0 end supply_div FROM [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[EINA] ) eina on mara.MATNR = eina.MATNR where mara.MTART in ('ROH', 'HAWA', 'FERT','HALB') ) tot group by tot.matnr, tot.supply_div, tot.meins order by tot.matnr

SELECT 'PSIX1' as data_type , 'A4600001' as base_code , 'DUMMY' as base_code1 , matnr , psttr , pedtr , SUM(absat) as gsmng , meins , CONVERT(CHAR(8), getdate(), 112) as data_dt from( select mara.matnr ,s076.sptag ,s076.SPWOC , s076.ABSAT , case when convert(int,s076.SPWOC) != 0 then convert(varchar(10),DATEADD(DAY, right(s076.SPWOC collate SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS,2) * 7 , DATEADD(DAY, -(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, concat(left(s076.SPWOC collate SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS,4),N'-01-01'))) + 1 , concat(left(s076.SPWOC collate SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS ,4),N'-01-01'))) ,112) else s076.sptag end psttr , case when convert(int,s076.SPWOC) != 0 then convert(varchar(10),DATEADD(DAY, right(s076.SPWOC collate SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS,2) * 7 + 6 , DATEADD(DAY, -(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, concat(left(s076.SPWOC collate SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS,4),N'-01-01'))) + 1 , concat(left(s076.SPWOC collate SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS,4),N'-01-01'))) ,112) else s076.sptag end pedtr , case when s076.BASME = 'EA' then 'PC' else s076.BASME end meins from [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[MARA] mara inner join [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[S076] s076 on mara.MATNR = s076.PMNUX where mara.MTART in ('ROH', 'HAWA', 'FERT','HALB') and s076.ABSAT != 0 and s076.VRSIO = concat('2',right(concat('00',month(getdate())),2)) and (left(s076.sptag,6) between left(CONVERT(CHAR(10), getdate(), 112),6) and left(CONVERT(CHAR(10), DATEADD(month, 6, getdate()), 112),6) OR s076.SPWOC between concat(YEAR(CONVERT(date,concat(left(CONVERT(CHAR(10), getdate(), 121),7),'-01'))),right(concat('00',DATEPART(WEEK, concat(left(CONVERT(CHAR(10), getdate(), 112),6),'01'))),2)) and concat(YEAR(CONVERT(date,concat(left(CONVERT(CHAR(10), DATEADD(month, 6, getdate()), 121),7),'-01'))),right(concat('00',DATEPART(WEEK, concat(left(CONVERT(CHAR(10), DATEADD(month, 6, getdate()), 112),6),'01'))),2)) ) ) tot group by matnr,psttr,pedtr,meins order by psttr,pedtr,matnr

SELECT 'PSIX2' as data_type , MBLNR mblnr , 'A4600001' as base_code , out_pls_code , MATNR matnr , BUDAT budat , SUM(ERFMG) as erfmg , ERFME erfme , 'DUMMY' as lot , 'DUMMY' as ebeln , 'DUMMY' as ebelp , '' as result_key , '0' as air_flag , free_flag , CONVERT(CHAR(8), getdate(), 112) as data_dt , '' as reserve1 , '' as reserve2 , '' as reserve3 , '' as reserve4 , '' as reserve5 FROM( select mkpf.CPUDT , mseg.MBLNR , case when mseg.kunnr = 'A1000A01' then mseg.kunnr else 'DUMMY' end out_pls_code , mseg.MATNR , mkpf.BUDAT , case when mseg.SHKZG = 'S' then mseg.ERFMG when mseg.SHKZG = 'H' then mseg.ERFMG * (-1) end ERFMG , case when mseg.ERFME = 'EA' then 'PC' else mseg.ERFME end ERFME , case when ISNULL(mseg.ebeln,'') = '' then 'DUMMY' else mseg.ebeln end ebeln , case when ISNULL(mseg.ebelp,'') = '' then 'DUMMY' else mseg.ebelp end ebelp , case when mseg.BWART in('951','952') then 1 else 0 end free_flag from [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[MKPF] mkpf inner join [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[MSEG] mseg on mseg.MBLNR = mkpf.MBLNR inner join [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[MARA] mara on mseg.MATNR = mara.MATNR where /*mkpf.VGART = 'WA' and*/ mara.MTART IN('FERT','HALB','ROH','HAWA') and mseg.BWART in ('601','602','653','654','951','952') and mseg.INSMK != '3' and mseg.ERFMG != 0 and mkpf.CPUDT between CONVERT(CHAR(10), DATEADD(month, -2, getdate()), 112) and CONVERT(CHAR(10), getdate(), 112) ) tot group by CPUDT,MBLNR,MATNR, BUDAT, ERFME,out_pls_code, EBELN,ebelp, free_flag order by MBLNR,MATNR

SELECT 'PSIX3' as data_type , 'A4600001' as base_code , matnr , psttr , pedtr , SUM(gsmng) as gsmng , meins , CONVERT(CHAR(8), getdate(), 112) as data_dt from( select mara.matnr,plaf.PSTTR,plaf.PEDTR, plaf.GSMNG, case when plaf.MEINS = 'EA' then 'PC' else plaf.MEINS end meins from [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[MARA] mara inner join [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[PLAF] plaf on mara.MATNR = plaf.MATNR where mara.MTART in('ROH') and plaf.PLSCN = concat('2',right(concat('00',month(getdate())),2)) and plaf.GSMNG > 0 and left(plaf.PSTTR,6) between left(CONVERT(CHAR(10), DATEADD(month, -1, getdate()), 112),6) and left(CONVERT(CHAR(10), DATEADD(month, 6, getdate()), 112),6)
) tot group by matnr,psttr,pedtr,meins order by psttr,pedtr,matnr

SELECT 'PSIX4' as data_type ,MBLNR mblnr , 'A4600001' as base_code ,MATNR matnr , BUDAT budat ,SUM(ERFMG) as erfmg , ERFME erfme , 'DUMMY' as lot , CONVERT(CHAR(8), getdate(), 112) as data_dt , '' as reserve1 , '' as reserve2 , '' as reserve3 , '' as reserve4 , '' as reserve5 FROM( select mkpf.CPUDT, mseg.MBLNR,mseg.MATNR, mkpf.BUDAT,case when mseg.SHKZG = 'S' then mseg.ERFMG when mseg.SHKZG = 'H' then mseg.ERFMG * (-1) end ERFMG, case when mseg.ERFME = 'EA' then 'PC' else mseg.ERFME end ERFME from [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[MKPF] mkpf inner join [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[MSEG] mseg on mseg.MBLNR = mkpf.MBLNR inner join [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[MARA] mara on mseg.MATNR = mara.MATNR where mkpf.VGART = 'WA' and mara.MTART IN('FERT','HALB','ROH') and mseg.BWART in ('261','262') and mseg.INSMK != '3' and mseg.ERFMG != 0 and mkpf.CPUDT between CONVERT(CHAR(10), DATEADD(month, -2, getdate()), 112) and CONVERT(CHAR(10), getdate(), 112) ) tot group by CPUDT,MBLNR,MATNR, BUDAT, ERFME order by MBLNR,MATNR

SELECT 'PSIX5' as data_type , 'A4600001' as base_code , MATNR as matnr , PSTTR as psttr , PEDTR as pedtr , SUM(GSMNG) as gsmng , MEINS as meins , CONVERT(CHAR(8), getdate(), 112) as data_dt FROM( select plaf.MATNR , plaf.PSTTR , plaf.PEDTR , plaf.GSMNG , case when plaf.MEINS = 'EA' then 'PC' else plaf.MEINS end MEINS from [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[PLAF] plaf inner join [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[MARA] mara on plaf.MATNR = mara.MATNR where mara.MTART in('HALB', 'FERT') and plaf.PLSCN = concat('2',right(concat('00',month(getdate())),2)) and left(plaf.PSTTR,6) between left(CONVERT(CHAR(10), DATEADD(month, -1, getdate()), 112),6) and left(CONVERT(CHAR(10), DATEADD(month, 6, getdate()), 112),6)
union all
select afko.PLNBEZ as MATNR , afko.GSTRS as PSTTR , afko.GLTRS as PEDTR , afko.GAMNG as GSMNG , case when afko.GMEIN = 'EA' then 'PC' else afko.GMEIN end MEINS from [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[AFKO] afko inner join [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[MARA] mara on afko.PLNBEZ = mara.MATNR where mara.MTART in('HALB', 'FERT') and afko.GSTRS >= CONVERT(CHAR(8), getdate(), 112) ) tot group by MATNR , PSTTR , PEDTR , MEINS
order by MATNR , PSTTR , PEDTR , MEINS

SELECT 'PSIX6' as data_type ,MBLNR mblnr , 'A4600001' as base_code ,MATNR matnr , BUDAT budat ,SUM(ERFMG) as erfmg , ERFME erfme , 'DUMMY' as lot , CONVERT(CHAR(8), getdate(), 112) as data_dt , '' as reserve1 , '' as reserve2 , '' as reserve3 , '' as reserve4 , '' as reserve5 FROM( select mkpf.CPUDT, mseg.MBLNR,mseg.MATNR, mkpf.BUDAT,case when mseg.SHKZG = 'S' then mseg.ERFMG when mseg.SHKZG = 'H' then mseg.ERFMG * (-1) end ERFMG, case when mseg.ERFME = 'EA' then 'PC' else mseg.ERFME end ERFME from [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[MKPF] mkpf inner join [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[MSEG] mseg on mseg.MBLNR = mkpf.MBLNR inner join [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[MARA] mara on mseg.MATNR = mara.MATNR where mkpf.VGART = 'WF' and mara.MTART in('FERT','HALB') and mseg.BWART in ('101','102') and mseg.INSMK != '3' and mseg.ERFMG != 0 and mkpf.CPUDT between CONVERT(CHAR(10), DATEADD(month, -2, getdate()), 112) and CONVERT(CHAR(10), getdate(), 112) ) tot group by CPUDT,MBLNR,MATNR, BUDAT, ERFME order by MBLNR,MATNR

SELECT 'PSIX7' as data_type , mblnr , 'A4600' as base_code , '' as place_code , matnr , budat , SUM(menge) as menge , meins , ebeln , ebelp , 'DUMMY' as lot , CONVERT(CHAR(8), getdate(), 112) as data_dt , '' as reserve1 , '' as reserve2 , '' as reserve3 , '' as reserve4 , '' as reserve5 FROM( select mseg.mblnr ,mseg.matnr ,case when mseg.shkzg = 'S' then mseg.menge when mseg.shkzg = 'S' then mseg.menge * (-1) end menge ,case when mseg.meins = 'EA' then 'PC' else mseg.meins end meins ,case when ISNULL(mseg.ebeln,'') = '' then 'DUMMY' else mseg.ebeln end ebeln ,case when ISNULL(mseg.ebelp,'') = '' then 'DUMMY' else mseg.ebelp end ebelp ,mkpf.budat
from [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[MSEG] mseg inner join [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[MKPF] mkpf on mseg.MBLNR = mkpf.MBLNR where mseg.lifnr = 'A1000A01' and mseg.bwart in ('101','102','122','123','161','162') and mkpf.vgart = 'WE' and mseg.menge != 0 and mkpf.CPUDT between CONVERT(CHAR(10), DATEADD(month, -2, getdate()), 112) and CONVERT(CHAR(10), getdate(), 112) ) tot group by mblnr , matnr , budat , meins , ebeln , ebelp order by mblnr,matnr

select 'PSIX9' as data_type , ekpo.ebeln collate Korean_Wansung_CI_AS + N' / ' + convert(varchar,ekpo.ebelp collate Korean_Wansung_CI_AS) as orderresult_key , 'A4600' as base_code , case when ekpo.loekz = 'L' then 'DL' when ekpo.elikz = 'X' then 'OC' else 'OI' end status_val , ekpo.matnr , eket.eindt , eket.menge , case when ekpo.lmein = 'EA' then 'PC' else ekpo.lmein end lmein , ekko.aedat , CONVERT(CHAR(8), getdate(), 112) as data_dt from [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[EKKO] ekko inner join [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[EKPO] ekpo on ekko.ebeln = ekpo.ebeln inner join [ERP_DL].[WJP].[wjp].[EKET] eket on ekpo.ebeln = eket.ebeln and ekpo.ebelp = eket.ebelp where ekko.lifnr = 'A1000A01' order by eket.eindt,ekpo.ebeln,ekpo.ebelp,ekpo.matnr
